```{r setup, include=FALSE, echo=FALSE, warning=FALSE, message = FALSE}
#                      -=( Install & Load Package Function )=-
install_load <- function (package1, ...)  {   

   # convert arguments to vector
   packages <- c(package1, ...)

   # start loop to determine if each package is installed
   for(package in packages){

       # if package is installed locally, load
       if(package %in% rownames(installed.packages()))
          do.call('library', list(package))

       # if package is not installed locally, download, then load
       else {
          install.packages(package)
          do.call("library", list(package))
       }
   } 
}
```

# Data

```{r}
susenas<-read.csv("Susenas Jawa Barat 2020.csv", sep = ";")
head(susenas)
```

Data Susenas Provinsi Jawa Barat tahun 2020

```{r}
namakabupaten<-read.csv("nama kabupaten.csv",sep = ",")
head(namakabupaten)
```

```{r}
datakab <- namakabupaten[namakabupaten$nama_prov=="JAWA BARAT",]; datakab
datakab <- cbind(datakab$nama_kab,datakab$kab); datakab
str(datakab)
datakab <- as.data.frame(datakab); datakab
colnames(datakab) <- c("Nama Kabupaten","KabKota")
datakab
```

```{r}
datadf <- merge(susenas, datakab, by="KabKota")
head(datadf)
```

```{r}
datadfbandung <- datadf[datadf$`Nama Kabupaten`=="BANDUNG",]
table(datadfbandung$KabKota)
```

#Stacked Bar Chart

```{r}
ggplot(datadf, aes(x=`Nama Kabupaten`, fill=Status_Rawan)) + geom_bar(position="fill") + theme(axis.text.x = element_text(angle = 90, vjust = 0.5, hjust = 1))
```

```{r}
library(dplyr)
percentDatadaerah <- datadf %>% 
  group_by(`Nama Kabupaten`) %>% 
  count(Status_Rawan) %>% 
  mutate(ratio=scales::percent(n/sum(n)))
head(percentDatadaerah)
```

```{r}
ggplot(datadf, aes(x=`Nama Kabupaten`, fill=Status_Rawan)) + geom_bar(position="fill") + theme(axis.text.x = element_text(angle = 90, vjust = 0.5, hjust = 1))+ geom_text(data=percentDatadaerah,aes(y=n,label=ratio),color="white",position=position_fill(vjust=0.5),size = 2)
```

Mewarnai manual

```{r}
ggplot(datadf, aes(x=`Nama Kabupaten`, fill=Status_Rawan)) + geom_bar(position="fill") + theme(axis.text.x = element_text(angle = 90, vjust = 0.5, hjust = 1)) + geom_text(data=percentDatadaerah,aes(y=n,label=ratio),color="white",position=position_fill(vjust=0.5),size = 2)+scale_fill_manual(values=c("#7be217", "#4f58ab"))
```
